examples.input: The new city library is a five-story building located at 789 Wisdom Avenue. It features a dedicated children's section, a digital media lab, private study rooms, a community event space, and a rooftop garden. The library also offers free Wi-Fi, access to over 100,000 books, an extensive e-book collection, and inter-library loan services. It is open seven days a week, from 9 AM to 9 PM on weekdays and 10 AM to 6 PM on weekends. The head librarian is Ms. Eleanor Vance. The construction was funded by a city bond and private donations, totaling $25 million. It officially opened on January 15, 2024.
examples.response: <memory_write>New city library,number_of_stories,five</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,located_at,789 Wisdom Avenue</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,features,dedicated children's section</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,features,digital media lab</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,features,private study rooms</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,features,community event space</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,features,rooftop garden</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,offers,free Wi-Fi</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,offers,access to over 100,000 books</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,offers,extensive e-book collection</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,offers,inter-library loan services</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,open_days,seven days a week</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,weekday_hours,9 AM to 9 PM</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,weekend_hours,10 AM to 6 PM</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,head_librarian,Ms. Eleanor Vance</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,construction_funding_source,city bond</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,construction_funding_source,private donations</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,total_funding_dollars,25 million</memory_write><memory_write>New city library,opening_date,January 15 2024</memory_write>

examples.input: The 'Solaris Project' is a large-scale renewable energy initiative. It involves building a 500 MW solar farm in Nevada and a 300 MW wind farm in Texas. examples.input: The new AI research lab, 'Cognition Nexus', focuses on explainable AI (XAI), robust machine learning, and AI ethics. It's a collaboration between three universities: Stanford, Cambridge, and ETH Zurich. The lab has secured $150 million in initial funding for five years. Its primary goal is to develop AI systems that are not only powerful but also transparent, fair, and accountable. They plan to publish all research openly and host annual workshops. The lab officially commenced operations on March 1, 2024, and is directed by a committee of professors from the participating institutions. They are currently hiring 50 PhD students and 20 postdoctoral researchers.
examples.response: <memory_write>Cognition Nexus,is,new AI research lab</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,focuses_on,explainable AI</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,focuses_on,robust machine learning</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,focuses_on,AI ethics</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,is_collaboration_between,Stanford University</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,is_collaboration_between,Cambridge University</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,is_collaboration_between,ETH Zurich</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,secured_funding_dollars,150 million</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,funding_duration_years,five</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,primary_goal,develop transparent AI systems</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,primary_goal,develop fair AI systems</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,primary_goal,develop accountable AI systems</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,plans,publish research openly</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,plans,host annual workshops</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,commenced_operations_date,March 1 2024</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,directed_by,committee of professors</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,hiring_count_phd_students,50</memory_write><memory_write>Cognition Nexus,hiring_count_postdoctoral_researchers,20</memory_write>
